price: د هغوى لپاره به د جهنم هم فرش او هم د پاسه اغوستن وي او ظالمانو ته همداسې سزا وركوو.
arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lahum min jahannama mihādun wamin fawqihim ghawāshin wakadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
